\min\{p(\mathbf{x}|y=+1),p(\mathbf{x}|y=-1)\}=0. \implies \min\{\frac{p(y=+1|\mathbf{x})p(\mathbf{x})}{p(y=+1)},\frac{p(y=-1|\mathbf{x})p(\mathbf{x})}{p(y=-1)}\}=0 \implies \min\{\frac{p(y=+1|\mathbf{x})}{p(y=+1)},\frac{p(y=-1|\mathbf{x})}{p(y=-1)}\}=0 \implies \
$$
